posts.post_content:
Mostly Poor.  A few have paperloss, writing, boogers etc. (I'll toss in a few extras.)

A smattering of Minor leaguers in this lot; (augusta, danville, buff, columbus, balt etc). Those have decent backs.

Send me an offer by email please no PMs. Merci, Steve

PP gift shipping/ins extra. 

[url]fdnyladder7@comcast.net[/url]

Just have to say thanks again to Steve.

These cards are marvelous and Steve's service is prompt and his grading is generous...to say the least.

Rob
